SELECT tco.id id, tco.customer_id customerId, tco.parent_comment_id parentCommentId, tco.content_id contentId, tco.content content, tco.comment_time commentTime, tco.state state, tco.type type FROM t_comment tco WHERE tco.parent_comment_id = 0 AND tco.type = 1 AND tco.state = 0 And tco.content_id = #{id} ORDER BY CONCAT( tco.comment_time ) DESC

SELECT a.id, a.thematic_url, a.title, a.`data`, a.create_time, a.update_time, ui.user_name, ui.image, COUNT( b.parent_comment_id = 0 OR NULL ) AS comments, ( SELECT count(1) FROM like_num_info WHERE article_id = a.id ) AS likenum FROM (article_info a) LEFT JOIN t_comment b ON b.content_id = a.id LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ui.id = a.user_name GROUP BY a.id
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
